job_history.work_description: Counsels and advises students concerning financial aid opportunities, application processes and financial management strategies. Educates students in the identification of all sources of financial aid available, including the requirements and regulations within programs. Successfully manages $30,000 annual childcare assistance budget. Interprets, implements and ensures the College is in compliance with state and federal agencies by maintaining a thorough knowledge of federal and state financial aid, scholarship rules and regulations.

Counsels prospective and enrolled students, parents and community members on all aspects of financial aid. Reconciles differences that arise between what was awarded and what the student is eligible to receive for state and federal student aid. Communicates and works with employees to gain understanding of a commitment to set work standards, processes, and procedures.

Minimizes delinquency rates on retail loans through successful negotiations and problem resolution with clients. Improves processes in management of delinquent loans-through thorough analysis-preventing foreclosures, charge-offs, and repossessions.

education.university: UNIVERSITY OF NORTH CAROLINA AT PEMBROKE
education.domain: Business Administration Finance Management Information Systems

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in managing financial aid budgets, interpreting financial regulations, and providing financial counseling to students, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Budgeting
skills.explanation: Successfully managed a $30,000 annual childcare assistance budget, showing a solid working proficiency in budgeting.

skills.name: Client Communication
skills.explanation: Has experience in counseling and advising students, parents, and community members on financial aid, indicating strong proficiency in client communication.

skills.name: Negotiation
skills.explanation: Has experience in negotiating with clients to minimize delinquency rates on retail loans, showing a solid working proficiency in negotiation.

skills.name: Problem Resolution
skills.explanation: Has experience in resolving problems and discrepancies in financial aid awards, showing a solid working proficiency in problem resolution.
